Web.name: Mnemonic Major Converter
Web.description: A system which can convert between corresponding numbers and words to aid in numeric memorization. Conversion is done based on pronunciation with a fallback to letter conversions. Read the about page for more detail.

Web.name: Personal Startpage
Web.description: Titled “~”, this is a personal portal which links together many of the self-hosted or external services that I use. It uses OAuth 2 authentication and LDAP authorization to disallow access to private services.
